CustomField.formula: CASE( ucinn_ascendv2__Involvement_Code__r.Award_Unit_College__c , 'Agriculture and Life Sciences', 'Agriculture and Life Sciences', 'Athletics', 'Athletics', 'Business', 'Business', 'Design', 'Design', 'Engineering', 'Engineering', 'Extension', 'Extension', 'Graduate', 'Graduate', 'Human Sciences', 'Human Sciences', 'Interdisciplinary', 'Interdisciplinary', 'Liberal Arts and Sciences', 'Liberal Arts and Sciences', 'Memorial Union', 'Memorial Union', 'Veterinary Medicine', 'Veterinary Medicine', NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field dictates who is eligible to receive award. Interdisciplinary means not specific to a certain unit.
CustomField.label: Award Unit College
